name: Technology Skills classes and Employment Center- Adults
description: Computer workshops and resources to help with your job search. Free Job Search Assistance, Computer and Job Search Skills Workshops, Employer Spotlights, and Job Search Strategy Groups. Resume and cover letter assistance. Assistance studying for GED, NCLEX-PN, and NCLEX-RN.
fullDescription: Computer workshops and resources to help with your job search. Free Job Search Assistance, Computer and Job Search Skills Workshops, Employer Spotlights, and Job Search Strategy Groups. Resume and cover letter assistance. Assistance studying for GED, NCLEX-PN, and NCLEX-RN.
whatTheyOffer: Computer workshops and resources to help with your job search. Free Job Search Assistance, Computer and Job Search Skills Workshops, Employer Spotlights, and Job Search Strategy Groups. Resume and cover letter assistance. Assistance studying for GED, NCLEX-PN, and NCLEX-RN.
howToGetIt: Call mainline or see website for the most up to date information.
cost: All services free except for career coaching which is $120
